title: Governance Target & Configuration Management State Schema
description: Defines the structured state for autonomous governance targets, mandates, and their operational status within the Sovereign AGI system. Ensures state integrity and comprehensive auditability.

governanceID.description: Unique identifier for the specific governance task or goal mandate.

mandateType.description: Categorization of the governance mandate's purpose.

currentState.description: The current operational state of the governance mandate.

targetConfigurationHash.description: SHA-256 hash of the intended target configuration artifact, ensuring state immutability check.

isTerminalState.description: Flag indicating if the current state prevents further execution or transitions (e.g., COMPLETED states).

transitionLog.description: A chronological, auditable record of all state changes.

actorID.description: The AGI component, policy engine, or human operator initiating the change.

transitionHash.description: Cryptographic validation hash for the transition event.

metricTrackers.description: References to performance indicators tracking progress toward the governance goal. Uses a normalized object structure.
